actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the allocation of the investment credit for public utility property owned in common in proportion to ownership.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the allocation of the investment tax credit for public utility property owned in common according to proportion of ownership.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for the allocation of the investment credit for public utility property owned in common in proportion to ownership.
